      • give

        public int give(int amount)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Player gives money (symbolic) In fact, it chip stack is decreased of the value to give It start from the max valued chip (e.g Chip.BROWN_10000)
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount the player has to give
        Returns:
        the effective amout the player has given
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - : if the player cannot pay it throws an exception

      • giveForValue

        protected int giveForValue(java.lang.Integer value,
                           int amountToGive,
                           int numberChipValueThePlayerHas)
        Get the amount the player gives Update it chip number `chips`
        Parameters:
        value - the chip value (level) to manage
        amountToGive - the amount to give
        numberChipValueThePlayerHas - the number of chip, the player has, according to this value
        Returns:
        the amount the player gives
